name: KlubCoin
description: Klubcoin is designed specifically for the electronic music industry. Trusted by some of the biggest night clubs, festivals and EDM brands globally, offering Web3 ownership and rewards in both physical and digital events KlubCoin offers real life usage and utility for party-goers as well as clubs, festivals and more. Users can purchase tickets, drinks, book VIP tables, get cashback and loyalty rewards as well as hold $KLUB and get access to exclusive money-canâ€™t-buy experiences; or convert them into fiat.
